item.title: Argo-event filters: expr filter in action
item.description: Today I found my argo-events sensor executed triggers which I was not intended to. In the logs, I found that ref fields of those non-intended triggers all started with "refs/heads/dev". I checked again with document and found this surprising truth: If data type is string, you can pass either an exact value or a regex. In any case that value will be evaluated as a regex. Considing my following data filter, no wonder it triggers more than I expected.

item.title: Workaround the limitation of authorization header of webhook in argo-events
